game.name: Train Simulator: DB BR 187 Loco Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Freight is ready to roll, climb aboard state-of-the-art traction and haul heavy consists along the busy Rheintalbahn with our DB BR 187 for Train Simulator!
